title:
When can we expect I-95 to install a toll at each end of the state.  A $2.00  toll similar and cheaper than MD or DE, would help pay for widening of I-95 which is badly needed. Georgia just widened theirs the entire length of the state. We can\'t be behind Georgia!! 



Envision how much income $2 per car would give the state in one year!
text:
